## Installation

You can install the development version of MRGN from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Jarred6068/MRGN")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(MRGN)
## basic example code
```
